name: The Legend of Gandar
description:
The Legend of Gandar is an action-adventure video game.
The graphics are 2D and you play from a bird's eye view.
The player slips into the legend of Gandar, in the role of the farm boy.
He woke up one day and received a strange letter, and so begins the story of a boy-turned-hero.
Explore the world of Gandar and help people, complete tasks to get higher progress and he fights against vicious monsters that are attacking this land.
But be careful, your adventure won't be a bed of roses.
In addition, it has a lot of side quests ready.

Key Features

  • Adventure Mode
  • Combat system in 2D
  • RPG Fantasy
